content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TSVAL1
      operator: non_empty
    - name: TSVAL
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000151
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Trigger error when TSVAL1 is populated and TSVAL is null
Outcome:
  Message: TSVAL is null when TSVAL1 is populated.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0261
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Text over 200 characters can be added to additional
                  columns TSVAL1-TSVALn.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.4.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TS

json.Description: Trigger error when TSVAL1 is populated and TSVAL is null

Outcome.Message: TSVAL is null when TSVAL1 is populated.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Text over 200 characters can be added to additional columns TSVAL1-TSVALn.
